alert.note: Alert for Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:24PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Collier County through 730 PM EDT... At 624 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Ave Maria, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Immokalee, Orangetree, Big Corkscrew Island, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Miles City, Sunniland, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve, Picayune Strand State Forest, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd and Lake Trafford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
